/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below.

On either side of the street, tall buildings stretch towards the sky, their facades adorned with a variety of colors and architectural styles. The buildings are interspersed with lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the concrete jungle. The sun shines brightly in the sky, casting a warm glow over the scene and illuminating the cityscape with a soft light.

The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of looking up towards the sky. This perspective also allows for a comprehensive view of the street and its surroundings, providing a glimpse into the daily life in this part of Beijing.
